Posted By: Nagoragama (7/27/2011 1:09:25 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I like it. Typically you would [Armageddon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Armageddon) w/ a [Dingus Egg](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Dingus Egg) out, sending all lands to the GY taking 2 for each land and subsequently screw yourself. Now, I could cast [Reverse Damage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reverse Damage), or [Circle Of Protection: Artifact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Circle Of Protection: Artifact) or some garbage, right? If it's countered though, S.O.L huh?  
  
Not anymore.  
If you're behind on life, and your ultimate goal is to possibly cause all involved a heap o' damage, you lose. Well my friends, that's the biggest PITA about Land Destruction. This card allows me to gain 4 life just before resolution of the Armageddon, thus off-setting the damage of up 2 lands going to my GY.
posts.html:
